sense.def:
Izraz
for instance
uporabimo, kadar navedemo primer za tisto, o čemer govorimo.

seg.quote: I mean, for instance, a man like Tom.
For instance, an electric fire is a relatively expensive method of heating a room.

sense.def:
An instance
je določen primer nekega dogodka, položaja ali osebe.

seg.quote: I do not think that in this instance the doctor was right.
